text_en: @JB KB So how does the latter's ordinary traffic penetrate the wall? Is it also to be provided through other servers?

text: 区别就是vpn要通过链接网络提供商的服务器再链接外网，流量特征非常明显，电信局知道你在链接外网但不知道你在干嘛。SSR和v2就是先把流量混淆加密伪装成普通的流量直接穿墙链接外网。让电信局以为你没有翻墙只是普通的上网。
author: JB KB
text_en: The difference is that vpn needs to connect to the external network through the server of the network provider. The traffic characteristics are very obvious. The telecommunications bureau knows that you are connecting to the external network but does not know what you are doing. SSR and v2 are to first confuse and encrypt the traffic and pretend to be ordinary traffic directly through the wall to connect to the external network. Let the telecommunications bureau think that you have not circumvented the wall, just ordinary Internet access.

text: 你都没搞清楚,就来科普,叠瓦式硬盘的原理是,硬盘的磁头分为读和写,读的时候需要功率小,写的时候需要的功率大,所以读写磁头的宽度是不一样的,非叠瓦式硬盘,相邻磁道的最小间距是略大于写磁头的宽度的,而实际上读数据时并不需要这么宽的磁道,这就导致了盘面空间的浪费,所以叠瓦式硬盘记录数据时,磁道之间靠得更近,但并不会重叠,读的时候没有问题,写的时候因为写磁头更宽就会影响相邻磁道的数据,所以在写之前要把邻磁道数据做缓存.
author: 半山
text_en: If you haven’t figured it out, just come to science. The principle of the shingled hard disk is that the head of the hard disk is divided into read and write. When reading, it needs low power, and when writing, it needs high power, so the width of the read and write head is not Similarly, for non-shingled hard disks, the minimum distance between adjacent tracks is slightly larger than the width of the write head. In fact, when reading data, such wide tracks are not required, which leads to a waste of disk space, so shingles When recording data on a type hard disk, the tracks are closer together, but they will not overlap. There is no problem when reading. When writing, because the write head is wider, it will affect the data of adjacent tracks. The track data is cached.

text:
​ @hanyu  R0本来就是用来检测 Q A Z的 所以 如果往R0里注水 C0 C1出水是正常的 
R1注水才是 检测W S X这时只会C0出水 因为 无法通过S流向C1 也没有水可以流到A(止回阀阻止水流进入R0)
止回阀的作用是 避免R0 R1 R2 之间互相干扰
好好思考下 如果还想不清楚那我也不知道怎么再解释的更清楚了
author: dreamy g
text_en:
​ @hanyu R0 was originally used to detect Q A Z, so if water is injected into R0, C0 C1 is normal.
R1 water injection is to detect W S X. At this time, only C0 will discharge water because it cannot flow through S to C1 and no water can flow to A (the check valve prevents water from entering R0)
The role of the check valve is to avoid mutual interference between R0, R1, R2
Think about it, if I still don’t think about it, then I don’t know how to explain it more clearly.

text: dreamy g 就是在依次注水的情况下也做不到啊。现在Q下面有两根管子，左侧带止回阀的和下面不带止回阀的（R0），如果像视频中那样水只从左侧的带止回阀的管子通过那么往R0里注的水就无法到达A处。如果水从Q下面的不带止回阀的管子通过那么止回阀的作用就无法体现了。
author: hanyu
text_en: dreamy g can't be done even when water is injected sequentially. Now there are two pipes under Q, the one with check valve on the left and the one without check valve below (R0). If the water only passes through the pipe with check valve on the left as in the video, then go to R0. The injected water cannot reach point A. If water passes through the pipe under Q without a check valve, the function of the check valve cannot be realized.

text:
@hanyu  你漏了个很重要的条件
4:04 依次注水
在同一时间 永远只向 R0 R1 R2 其中一条注水
如果同时向 R0 R1注水 确实无法分辨S有没有被按下 止回阀也是为了做到这一点
author: dreamy g
text_en:
@Hanyu You missed a very important condition
4:04 inject water sequentially
At the same time, only fill one of R0, R1, R2 with water
If you pour water into R0 and R1 at the same time, you really can’t tell whether S is pressed or not. The check valve is also for this purpose.

text: @dreamy g  从示意图来看完全做不到啊
author: hanyu
text_en: @Dreamy g From the schematic diagram, it can't be done at all

text:
@dreamy g  R0注水以后QA同时按下，
水会从C0，C1中流出来，说明C0和C1是联通的，既然如此，C0中如果有水的话（R1注水W按下），而此时A又被按下的话那水就会从C1流出来啊，图中的止回阀根本起不到作用啊（我说的是图中，我理解up想表达的意思）。
author: hanyu
text_en:
@Dreamy g Press QA at the same time after R0 is filled with water,
Water will flow out from C0 and C1, indicating that C0 and C1 are connected. In this case, if there is water in C0 (R1 is filled with water and W is pressed), and then A is pressed again, the water will flow from C1 Come out, the check valve in the picture doesn't work at all (I'm talking about the picture, I understand what up wants to express).

text: @hanyu  重点在于 只向R1注水的话 R0里永远都不会有水
author: dreamy g
text_en: @Hanyu The point is that if you only pour water into R1, there will never be water in R0

text: @hanyu  注意下 4:20左右的示意图里 箭头(流动方向)和❎(完全不流通)所在的位置应该就能理解了
author: dreamy g
text_en: @Hanyu Note that the position of the arrow (flow direction) and ❎ (completely no flow) in the schematic diagram around 4:20 should be understandable

text: @hanyu  单向流向指的是 可以从由Rx流入到Cx 无法从Cx流回Rx
author: dreamy g
text_en: @Hanyu Unidirectional flow refers to that it can flow from Rx to Cx and cannot flow from Cx back to Rx

text:
dreamy g 单向流动的方向是Q➡️A和W➡️S方向是吧？
1我认同
可是2的话，水可以从W➡️Q➡️A路线流过啊。
author: hanyu
text_en:
dreamy g The direction of unidirectional flow is Q➡️A and W➡️S, right?
1 I agree
However, in the case of 2, water can flow through W➡️Q➡️A route.

text:
视频里提到的止回阀 除了防止回流一个功能以外 应该还有主动关阀功能
红叉的时候(没摁键)是 彻底断流
绿箭头的时候(摁键)是 单向流动

W摁下时
1. 水流没法通过S的管道进入C1
2. 水流无法通过Q的管道回流进入R0, 也就不会有水流通过A的管道进入C1
author: dreamy g
text_en:
The check valve mentioned in the video should have an active valve closing function in addition to the function of preventing backflow.
When the red cross (without pressing the key) is completely cut off
When the green arrow (press the key) is one-way flow

When W is pressed down
1. Water cannot enter C1 through the pipe of S
2. The water flow cannot flow back into R0 through the pipe of Q, so there will be no water flow through the pipe of A to enter C1

text:
@hanyu  逻辑上 如果把示意图中的所有键往左移一点 全部移动到止回阀正上方的水管 可能更好理解一点
因为 按键是用来控制止回阀是否接通的
a. 摁下 止回阀开通 允许单向流动
b. 默认 止回阀完全阻塞 无流体通过
author: dreamy g
text_en:
@Hanyu Logically, if you move all the keys in the diagram to the left a little bit and move them all to the water pipe directly above the check valve, it might be better to understand
Because the button is used to control whether the check valve is turned on
a. Press down, the check valve opens, allowing one-way flow
b. By default, the check valve is completely blocked and no fluid passes through

text:
@hanyu  往R0注水的话 
1. 在Q的岔口分流
2. 顺着止回阀进入C0
3. W的止回阀 阻止水流进入R1; E的止回阀完全封闭 水流无法进入R2; 最终水流顺着C0左边的出口流出
4. 接step1 另一道分流顺着R0到A 分流
5. 顺着止回阀进入C1
6. S的止回阀完全封闭 水流无法进入R1; D的止回阀完全封闭 水流无法进入R2; 最终水流顺着C1左边的出口流出
7. 接step4 另一道分流顺着R0到Z 分流
8. 止回阀完全封闭 无水进入C2
9. 接step7 另一道分流顺着R0到底 (示意图到此结束)
(如果后面还有连接的话 以此类推)


总结 
示意图中R0是检测 Q A Z 的
水流从C0 C1流出是expected
止回阀 防止水流进入 非R0的Rx管道
author: dreamy g
text_en:
@Hanyu Inject water to R0
1. Diversion at the fork of Q
2. Follow the check valve and enter C0
3. The check valve of W prevents the water flow from entering R1; the check valve of E is completely closed, the water cannot enter R2; finally the water flows out along the left exit of C0
4. Connect to step1, another shunt follow R0 to A shunt
5. Follow the check valve and enter C1
6. The check valve of S is completely closed. Water cannot enter R1; the check valve of D is completely closed. Water cannot enter R2; finally the water flows out along the left exit of C1
7. Connect to step4, another shunt follow R0 to Z shunt
8. The check valve is completely closed and no water enters C2
9. Follow step7 and follow R0 to the end (the diagram ends here)
(If there is a connection later, and so on)


to sum up 
In the schematic diagram, R0 is used to detect Q A Z
Water flow from C0 C1 is expected
Check valve to prevent water from entering Rx pipes other than R0

text:
@啃芝士  我觉得你可以讲讲 Nand门 怎么构成计算机芯片的核心ALU门, 
如何实现加法减法等, 
RAM是如何实现随机存储的, 
RAM512 等大量的存储单元如何存储 ,
汇编语言是如何和硬件系统交互, 
高级语言如何和底层语言交互,  
这个肯定不冷门,  而且底层知识至少都是由单一几个元素组合而成, 越往上才越抽象越难以理解...
author: peng peng
text_en:
@啃芝士 I think you can talk about how the Nand gate constitutes the core ALU gate of a computer chip.
How to implement addition and subtraction, etc.,
How RAM implements random storage,
How to store a large number of storage units such as RAM512,
How the assembly language interacts with the hardware system,
How high-level languages interact with low-level languages,
This is certainly not unpopular, and the underlying knowledge is at least composed of a few elements. The more abstract it is, the more difficult it is to understand...

text: 你把dns和ip混淆了吧！dns的作用解析域名变成ip地址，如果你记得该网站的ip地址不需要输入域名的，比如百度ip地址是202.108.22.5，你直接在浏览器地址输入就可以访问百度。防火墙主要把ip地址屏蔽了，无论你换国内的dns还是国外dns都没有用，vpn主要制作虚拟的ip地址，它把你的ip地址和访问的ip地址都给虚拟了，全都交给vpn服务器处理。
author: 川宝
text_en: You confuse dns and ip! The role of dns resolves the domain name into an ip address. If you remember that the ip address of the website does not need to enter the domain name, for example, the Baidu ip address is 202.108.22.5, you can directly enter the browser address to visit Baidu. The firewall mainly shields the ip address. It doesn’t matter whether you change to a domestic dns or a foreign dns. VPN mainly makes virtual ip addresses. It virtualizes your ip address and the ip address you visit, and gives them all to the vpn server. deal with.

text:
dns服务器并不是在客户机和服务器之间。dns服务器是解析我们发送的域名请求的一个服务器，我们拿到dns发还的ip去请求网页内容。
你可以自己解析ip（比如修改hosts文件），然后直接访问网站，完全抛开dns服务器。
author: dom free
text_en:
The dns server is not between the client and the server. The dns server is a server that resolves the domain name request we send, and we get the IP returned by dns to request web content.
You can parse the ip yourself (for example, modify the hosts file), and then directly visit the website, completely abandoning the dns server.

In fact, QQ is the same for users. But because the platforms are different, you must use platform-specific things. The language used is different, the rules used are different, the algorithm is different, and so on. (Equivalent to the different building structure you mentioned) So the software under the two platforms will have performance differences. (Simple means each has its own advantages) But Qualcomm's ARM architecture also has to challenge X86. Snapdragon notebooks and servers

author: Minghua Tong
text_en:
The analogy of complex/reduced instruction set is really bad...
I got dizzy after watching this video

text: 就是指令的集合，cpu能执行的只有简单的指令。指令集就是cpu能够执行的所有指令的集合。x86和arm的指令集不同，虽然同样一段c++或者java代码，编译后都可以在上面运行，但是在不同平台上运行程序时所执行的cpu指令可能是不一样的。
author: 崔明飞
text_en: It is a collection of instructions, and the cpu can execute only simple instructions. The instruction set is the set of all instructions that the cpu can execute. The instruction sets of x86 and arm are different. Although the same piece of c++ or java code can be run on it after compilation, the cpu instructions executed when the program is run on different platforms may be different.

text: 指令集是机器底层语言集合，最简单的例子就是我们常见的python c++ java 等都是表层语言，需要经过一个中间模块转化成相应框架的底层语言x86 arm等，cpu只能通过底层语言执行命令。所以总结来说，arm框架使用的cisc指令对机器底层处理更友好，但是对于编程的表层语言和中间转化模块的处理就要相对复杂
author: Louis Luan
text_en: The instruction set is a collection of the machine's underlying language. The simplest example is that our common python, c++, java, etc. are all surface languages, which need to be transformed into the underlying language x86 arm of the corresponding framework through an intermediate module. The cpu can only execute commands through the underlying language. So in summary, the cisc instructions used by the arm framework are more friendly to the underlying processing of the machine, but the processing of the programming surface language and intermediate conversion modules is relatively complicated.

什么叫做为了我们身心健康，封锁外网就是为了控制别人了解真实的中国和世界，好共产党自己独裁！我爱我的国家，可是我不爱共产党，就好像李世民爱国不代表爱隋朝朝政！中国虽然是共产党打下来的天下，可共产党独裁专制这些年，不愿意倾听民声，腐败政权霸行，很多政治层面、经济层面造假，大陆民众有苦不能言。很多人说因为有共产党才有中国发展的今天，这样想就是幼稚了！秦始皇当年搞暴政都不比现在的发展速度差。国家想要长远发展，就要给人民的基本人权与思想自由，美国政府早在林肯总统时期就明白这点。林肯总统曾经说过：可怕的不是社会黑暗，而是社会黑暗了还一昧的掩盖真相，自欺欺人的告诉别人社会如童话般美好。中国现在的政治就是固步自封！不打算面对自己的黑暗，只能用谎言欺瞒国人！大家想想都知道，中国自称有5000多年历史文化，而美国才200多年历史背景，可美国才用200年，无论科技还是人文思想就已经远超我国5000年的历史，美国才是高度发展的文明。相反共产党不给国人报道真相就是用谎言洗脑国民，沿袭古时候封建王朝的执政，造成很多不知情的国人变得盲目看待这世界！我们爱国没错，只是习近平这种没能力，没远见的人和腐朽的中共不值得我们去维护，如果今天我们中国人自己都不选择站起来反抗这种封建王朝的执政，我们中国人还指望谁改变中国现在这个病态的政治体系。革命还没有结束，因为中国思想控制狱还在！人民有天大的本事也不可能当家做主

author: 乖巧宝宝
text_en:
What is meant by blocking the Internet for our physical and mental health is to control others to understand the real China and the world, so that the Communist Party is dictatorial by itself! I love my country, but I don’t love the Communist Party, just like Li Shimin’s love for the country does not mean love for the Sui Dynasty’s government! Although China is the world under the control of the Communist Party, the Communist Party has been reluctant to listen to the voices of the people over the past few years under its dictatorship. The corrupt regime is domineering, and many political and economic aspects are fraudulent. The mainland people have troubles. Many people say that China has developed today because of the Communist Party. It is naive to think this way! Qin Shihuang's tyranny back then was no worse than the current development speed. If the country wants long-term development, it must give the people basic human rights and freedom of thought. The US government understood this as early as the time of President Lincoln. President Lincoln once said: It is not the social darkness that is terrible, but the concealment of the truth when the society is dark, and telling others that society is as beautiful as a fairy tale. China's politics now stands still! I don't plan to face my own darkness, I can only use lies to deceive the Chinese people! Everyone knows that China claims to have more than 5,000 years of history and culture, while the United States has a history of more than 200 years, but the United States has only used it for 200 years. Both science and technology and humanistic ideas have far surpassed my country’s 5,000 years of history. The United States is highly developed. civilization. On the contrary, the Communist Party’s failure to report the truth to the people is to brainwash the people with lies. It follows the rule of the feudal dynasty in ancient times, causing many unknowing people to blindly look at the world! We are patriotic. It’s just that Xi Jinping’s incompetent, visionary and decadent CCP are not worth our defense. If today we Chinese don’t choose to stand up against this feudal dynasty’s governance, we Chinese still count on it. Who changes China's current morbid political system? The revolution is not over yet, because the Chinese ideological control prison is still there! The people have great abilities and cannot be the masters

text:
结尾说的那段枯燥文字
H.264又称为MPEG-4第10部分，到2014年，它已经成为高精度视频录制、压缩和发布的最常用格式之一。H.264/AVC项目的目的是为了创建一个更佳的视频压缩标准，在更低的比特率的情况下依然能够提供良好视频质量的标准。

H.265围绕着现有的视频编码标准H.264，保留原来的某些技术，同时对一些相关的技术加以改进。新技术使用先进的技术用以改善码流、编码质量、延时和算法复杂度之间的关系，达到最优化设置。具体的研究内容包括：提高压缩效率、提高鲁棒性和错误恢复能力、减少实时的时延、减少信道获取时间和随机接入时延、降低复杂度等。H.264由于算法优化，可以低于1Mbps的速度实现标清数字图像传送；H.265则可以实现利用1~2Mbps的传输速度传送720P（分辨率1280*720）普通高清音视频传送。

Matroska是一种多媒体封装格式，这个封装格式可把多种不同编码的视频及16条或以上不同格式的音频和语言不同的字幕封装到一个Matroska Media档内。它也是其中一种开放源代码的多媒体封装格式。很多人把Matroska当作为mkv，其实mkv只是Matroska媒体系列的其中一种文件格式。

MP4全称MPEG-4 Part 14，是一种使用MPEG-4的多媒体电脑文件格式，扩展名为.mp4，以存储数字音频及数字视频为主。MP4至今仍是各大影音分享网站所使用主流，即使他们是在网站上多加一层Flash的影音播放接口。因为MP4可以在每分钟约4MB的压缩缩率下提供接近DVD质量的影音效果。MP4优点是压缩质量优、转换容易，目前智能手机的录像，大多都是MP4格式。

AVI是英语Audio Video Interleave（“音频视频交织”或译为“音频视频交错”）的首字母缩写，由微软在1992年11月推出的一种多媒体文件格式，用于对抗苹果Quicktime的技术。现在所说的AVI多是指一种封装格式。尽管AVI已经属于老旧的技术，但是由于Windows的通用性，和简单易懂的开发API，仍被广泛使用。 AVI将视频和音频封装在一个文件里，其顺序是：若干视频帧之后接着若干音频帧，再然后是视频帧、音频帧，故名为“音频视频交织”，意即音频和视频按帧交错排列，以此达到音频同步于视频播放的效果。
author: Allen Yuan
text_en:
The boring text at the end
H.264 is also known as MPEG-4 Part 10. By 2014, it has become one of the most commonly used formats for high-precision video recording, compression, and distribution. The purpose of the H.264/AVC project is to create a better video compression standard that can still provide good video quality at a lower bit rate.

H.265 revolves around the existing video coding standard H.264, retaining some of the original technologies, while improving some related technologies. The new technology uses advanced technology to improve the relationship between code stream, encoding quality, delay and algorithm complexity, and achieve optimal settings. Specific research contents include: improving compression efficiency, improving robustness and error recovery capabilities, reducing real-time delay, reducing channel acquisition time and random access delay, and reducing complexity. Due to the optimization of the algorithm, H.264 can realize standard-definition digital image transmission at a speed lower than 1Mbps; H.265 can realize the transmission of 720P (resolution 1280*720) ordinary high-definition audio and video transmission at a transmission speed of 1~2Mbps.

Matroska is a multimedia packaging format. This packaging format can encapsulate multiple different encoded videos and 16 or more audio and language subtitles in different formats into one Matroska Media file. It is also one of the open source multimedia packaging formats. Many people think of Matroska as mkv. In fact, mkv is just one of the file formats in the Matroska media series.

The full name of MP4 is MPEG-4 Part 14, which is a multimedia computer file format that uses MPEG-4 with an extension of .mp4. It mainly stores digital audio and digital video. MP4 is still the mainstream used by major video sharing websites, even if they add a layer of Flash video playback interface on the website. Because MP4 can provide audio and video effects close to DVD quality at a compression rate of about 4MB per minute. MP4 has the advantages of excellent compression quality and easy conversion. At present, most of the videos on smart phones are in MP4 format.

AVI is the acronym for English Audio Video Interleave ("Audio Video Interleave" or translated as "Audio Video Interleave"), a multimedia file format introduced by Microsoft in November 1992 to counter Apple's Quicktime technology. AVI referred to now mostly refers to a packaging format. Although AVI is an old technology, it is still widely used due to the versatility of Windows and the easy-to-understand development API. AVI encapsulates video and audio in one file, and the sequence is: several video frames followed by several audio frames, then video frames, audio frames, hence the name "audio-video interleaving", which means that audio and video are interlaced by frames Arrange to achieve the effect of audio synchronization with video playback.

text:
先指出你的错误，10的6次方是百万

兆本来指很大的数字，而中文里万已经是个很大的单位了，再大就叫十万，百万，千万。对于这些大数字以前应该是没有很统一的一个字作为单位的，所以以前也说中国有四万万（四亿）同胞，说明之前是不用亿的。所以这些大数字怎么表示呢，据我了解万的二次方，三次方，四次方，即亿，万亿，亿亿都有用兆来表示的情况，应该说兆在以前也不是很明确的单位吧？

而英文以千作为量级：
1000                    thousand
1000,000             million
1000,000,000     trillion
所以在中文里是没有千千这个单位的，然后就用兆代替千千了。所以内地会说1M为一兆。不过兆这个单位现如今基本也只用于计算机或相关领域，生活中表达数字我们还是会说百万。
author: bill zhang
text_en:
First point out your mistake, 10 to the 6th power is one million

Zhao originally refers to a very large number, but in Chinese, 10,000 is already a very large unit. No matter how big it is, it is called one hundred thousand, one million, or ten million. For these big numbers, there should not be a single word as a unit before. Therefore, it was said that China had forty million (400 million) compatriots before, indicating that there was no use of 100 million in the past. So how do you express these big numbers? As far as I know, the quadratic, third, and fourth power of ten thousand, that is, billions, trillions, and billions are all expressed in trillions. It should be said that trillions were not very clear before. Unit?

In English, the order of magnitude is a thousand:
1000 thousand
1000,000 million
1000,000,000 trillion
So in Chinese, there is no such thing as a thousand-thousand-thousand, and then trillions are used instead of thousand-thousands. Therefore, the mainland will say that 1M is one trillion. However, the unit of trillion is now basically only used in computers or related fields, and we still say millions in our lives to express numbers.

text:
這邊我說一下到底是怎麼了
首先 我們說的硬盤有兩種 SSD和HDD
HDD是機械硬盤
主要是利用一個讀取頭去探測某一個區域的磁場方向是甚麼
(讀取寫入的頭 = 磁頭)
通常會是4個碟片重疊在一起 利用8個磁頭去讀取 兩個磁頭為一對 4對磁頭各對應4個碟片
碟片會一起旋轉 磁頭也是一起動作 基本上你去讀取寫入某個文件的時候 實際上是四個一起工作
HDD是透過亂序寫入的方法來寫入資料的 他只要確定不修改到其他的數據就可以了
寫入的資訊由於是一個隨便的地區 所以 HDD是需要儲存資料的位置的
儲存資料的位置叫叢集
叢集採用3維定位的方法來記錄資料被寫入的地方
當你需要寫入資料的時候 你是依靠電流經過電感(線圈) 產生了一個磁場
這個磁場透過金屬磁頭從中部連結到他的尖尖
尖尖的地方會在資料的讀取寫入的地方
兩個尖尖是斷開的 他們會洩漏磁場 不能把磁場包覆住
所以洩漏的磁場會被磁碟捕捉 磁碟就會被磁化 往某個方向磁化是1 相反的方向就是0 如果沒有磁化就是無數據
當寫入結束的時候 叢集就會出現新的地址 這個地址就是剛才寫入的數據地址
但是 當作我們需要擦出資料的時候 磁頭並不是為了剩事而不去擦出
而是因為磁頭沒有任何的方法去把數據擦出
以新一點的HDD來說(老一點的方向是不一樣的)
我們把某個極性朝上 另外那個則往下
往上的是1 往下的是0
這個時候 就很清楚知道 磁頭沒有辦法擦出數據
你或許會認為全部改成0或者是1就可以了
00000000是NULL 也就是無字元
但是你別以為這就是無數據的意思 其實屬於一個數據 
例如說一下這個數據
010000010000000001000001
我們先把他們變成字節 並且翻譯出來我們知道的東西
01000001   A
00000000   
01000001   A
你可能說 中間沒東西啊 但拿遍其實是有東西的 只是你看不見而已
他們實際上是 A A
中間有一個空白字元
回歸到HDD 看到以上的情況 你就會發現磁頭怎麼改都是有數據
這個時候有人就會說 把數據改成第三個阿
首先 這裡會出現兩個問題 第一個是資料傳輸的問題
當然 這邊就肯定有人說 改成 +6V 0V -6V代表三種狀態就OK拉
沒錯 的確可以 但是還有第二個問題
你怎麼寫入第三個狀態
有些人就會說 磁場的北向改成往磁碟中心指阿
但是 電感就只有那兩個方向 你怎麼改?
所以 HDD刪除資料就是直接把叢集那邊的資訊刪除掉 然後就找不到地址取得資料了
當有新的資料寫入的時候 就會亂序寫入 當中了這個地方的時候 他就會直接修改掉 而不會重新選新的地點
至於SSD
SSD是一堆的nand flash組成
他們可以儲存0和1
當我們輸入數據的時候 主控會把資料拆分開 不同的資料去不同的顆粒
當我們寫入數據後 他就會以0和1的狀態儲存
當我們擦出的時候 她也只會清除掉地址而已 因為她就只有接地(0)和接電源(1)而已
SSD無法產生一個新的電壓 所以沒有第三個狀態 -電壓也是不可能的 因為我們根本就沒有-電壓提供給他 難度 5V要拆分成+2.5V 0V和-2.5V?
這很不現實 因為主機板只會接受0V或者是+5V 不接受+2.5V的數據 在這個地方的數據 不是被當作0 就是被當作1
所以就無法擦出
author: randomplay隨意玩
text_en:
Let me talk about what happened here
First of all, there are two types of hard drives: SSD and HDD
HDD is a mechanical hard drive
It mainly uses a reading head to detect the direction of the magnetic field in a certain area.
(Read and write head = magnetic head)
Usually 4 discs are overlapped together, using 8 heads to read, two heads are a pair, 4 pairs of heads each correspond to 4 discs
The discs will rotate together, and the heads will also work together. Basically, when you read and write a file, the four actually work together.
The HDD writes data through out-of-order writing. He just needs to make sure not to modify other data.
Since the written information is in a random area, the HDD needs to store the data.
The location where the data is stored is called the cluster
The cluster uses a 3-dimensional positioning method to record where the data is written
When you need to write data, you rely on the current passing through the inductor (coil) to generate a magnetic field.
This magnetic field is connected from the middle to his tip through the metal magnetic head
The sharp point will be in the place where the data is read and written
The two tips are disconnected, they will leak the magnetic field and cannot cover the magnetic field.
So the leaked magnetic field will be captured by the disk, and the disk will be magnetized. Magnetization in a certain direction is 1 and the opposite direction is 0. If there is no magnetization, there is no data.
When the writing is over, a new address will appear in the cluster. This address is the address of the data just written.
But when we need to wipe out the data, the head is not to wipe out the leftovers.
It’s because the head doesn’t have any way to erase the data
In the case of a newer HDD (the direction of the old one is different)
We put one polarity up and the other one down
The one going up is 1 and the one going down is 0
At this time, it is clear that the head cannot erase the data.
You might think that changing all to 0 or 1 is enough
00000000 is NULL, which means no characters
But don’t think that this means no data, it actually belongs to one data
For example, let’s talk about this data
010000010000000001000001
We first turn them into bytes and translate what we know
01000001 A
00000000
01000001 A
You may say that there is nothing in the middle, but there is actually something in the middle, but you can’t see it.
They are actually A A
There is a blank character in the middle
Returning to HDD and seeing the above situation, you will find that there is data no matter how the head is changed.
At this time, some people will say change the data to the third one
First of all, there will be two problems here. The first one is the problem of data transmission.
Of course, someone here must say that if it is changed to +6V, 0V, -6V, which means three states, it’s OK.
Yes, yes, but there is a second question
How do you write the third state
Some people will say that the north direction of the magnetic field is changed to point towards the center of the disk.
But the inductance only has those two directions. How can you change it?
So the HDD delete data is to delete the information on the cluster side directly, and then you can’t find the address to get the data.
When new data is written, it will be written out of order. When this place is in it, he will directly modify it instead of reselecting a new location.
As for SSD
SSD is composed of a bunch of nand flash
They can store 0 and 1
When we input data, the main control will split the data into different data to different particles
When we write the data, it will be stored in the state of 0 and 1.
When we erase it, she will only erase the address, because she only has ground (0) and power (1).
SSD can't generate a new voltage, so there is no third state-voltage is impossible because we don't have any-voltage is provided to him. Difficulty 5V should be split into +2.5V 0V and -2.5V?
This is very unrealistic because the motherboard will only accept 0V or +5V and not +2.5V data. The data in this place is either treated as 0 or 1
So it can't be erased

text: CPU的运算速度主要取决于晶振。以前有人发现某些材料接上直流电后时，会产生稳定频率的正弦波电流，就把这种现象称为晶振。1M的晶振每秒钟可以产生一百万个连续的正弦波，拥有1M晶振的CPU可以在一秒钟内识别出一百万个高低电平。晶振的频率属性越高，一秒钟内识别出的高低电平越多。
author: ning luo
text_en: The computing speed of the CPU mainly depends on the crystal oscillator. In the past, it was discovered that certain materials would produce a sine wave current with a stable frequency when they were connected to a direct current. This phenomenon was called a crystal oscillator. A 1M crystal oscillator can generate one million continuous sine waves per second, and a CPU with a 1M crystal oscillator can identify one million high and low levels in one second. The higher the frequency attribute of the crystal oscillator, the more high and low levels can be identified within one second.

text: 路由器就像是出租车，上车后司机司机需要知道你的目的地（IP 地址），然后司机来负责选择线路到达目的地。到达目的地的线路可能根据实际的交通情况有所变化。 交换机就像地铁，从A到B的线路是固定的，只要你选择了到达地址（MAC),你就只能乘坐某条固定的线路，地铁司机也不会司机也不问你去哪里。（来自网络）
author: 啃芝士
text_en: The router is like a taxi. After getting in the car, the driver and the driver need to know your destination (IP address), and then the driver is responsible for choosing the route to reach the destination. The route to the destination may vary according to actual traffic conditions. The switch is like the subway. The line from A to B is fixed. As long as you choose the arrival address (MAC), you can only take a certain fixed line. The subway driver will not ask you where you are going. (From the network)

冒着美国的知识产权制裁禁令，给伊朗贩卖美国设备，写出白纸黑字的合同被美国抓现行，令花了无数心血的中兴被制裁得一蹶不振。被美国抓住以上的把柄，更顺理成章的发起了贸易战，又选择硬抗，正好中了川普的圈套，关税一步步升得非常高，逼得外资大批外逃、华为被制裁得半死不活，不买美国猪肉又引进俄罗斯猪瘟，损失极其惨重。现在就算选择买农产品、买波音与美国停战，以上的损失还能挽回吗？
想做大国企、公私合营、环保一刀切、垃圾分类，不但助长了官僚借着治理的权力来贪污、更导致大片私企倒闭、上千万人返乡下岗潮、大批农民破产。外有贸易战，内被他的政策死命折腾，内需消费大降级。
想提前收回一国两制的香港自治权，不顾香港民意强推逃犯条例，引起香港人抗议，不肯做出一点妥协，派警察暴力镇压，彻底激怒香港人，几百万香港人抗议大半年至今。不但逃犯条例实行失败，香港的民心还尽失、反目成仇的局面。
镇压香港人让台湾人彻底看清一国两制的虚伪，纷纷拥护台独总统蔡英文再上位。实施了反滲透法、台北法案，台湾虽无独立之名、但已成独立之实，让花了十几年财力的台湾统战计划彻底破产。
还有习近平18年修宪，真的变成吾皇万岁万岁万万岁了呢。
author: busa haya
text_en:
@한국인이페스트에걸리다 So the United States is the only democratic country in the world? Trump hasn't done a good job. The American people can let him step down in the next term. Will Xi Jinping have done a good job? Can you let him step down if he doesn't do well? Let me give you a detailed list of what Xi Jinping has done.
The first is that the level of education is low, but you have to pretend to be very educated. I want everyone to respect him from the bottom of their hearts and respect him. As a result, a series of public relations disasters have occurred. Doctors in elementary school have become the laughing stock. Not only are they being ridiculed by the party’s high-level officials that “the faults remain unresolved and the accumulating evils become habit”, the Internet is also faced with accusations of yin and yang every day. There is no universal value, no understanding of modern civilization, but the new era of "Eastern and Red", Xi's thoughts, Xi Jinping's talk about state governance, etc. have to be thrown out. The sales abroad are almost zero, and the domestic ones are sold as waste products. . A bit of prestige gained in the anti-corruption campaign of the Eighteenth National Congress of the Communist Party of China broke out that the family corruption of Panama documents and his cousin's money laundering crimes were arrested. The image of Qingjun collapsed completely. No matter how he plays in the future, he is just a bare-bottomed emperor in the eyes of most people.The Thousand Talents Program, invested heavily in the establishment of Confucius Institutes, used money to bribe overseas students, professors in the United States, and Chinese businessmen in the United States to infiltrate the United States and steal high technology. To this day, most of the people sent are either driven out of the United States or arrested for heavy sentences.
Risking the United States’ intellectual property sanctions and prohibiting the sale of American equipment to Iran, the contract written in black and white was arrested by the United States, and ZTE, which had spent countless efforts, was sanctioned to a frustration. The U.S. seized the above handle, and more logically launched a trade war and chose to resist. It happened to be Trump’s trap. Tariffs rose step by step, forcing foreign capital to flee in large numbers, and Huawei was sanctioned half-dead. Buying American pork and introducing Russian swine fever have caused extremely heavy losses. Now even if you choose to buy agricultural products, buy Boeing and truce with the United States, can the above losses be restored?
The desire to become a large state-owned enterprise, public-private partnerships, environmental protection across the board, and garbage classification has not only encouraged bureaucrats to use the power of governance to embezzle, but also led to the closure of large private companies, tens of millions of people returning to work in the countryside, and a large number of farmers going bankrupt. There was a trade war on the outside, and his policies were tossed on the inside, and domestic consumption was greatly downgraded.
Wanting to withdraw the autonomy of one country, two systems ahead of time, Hong Kong people are forced to push the Fugitive Offenders Act in spite of Hong Kong people’s opinion, which arouses protests from Hong Kong people, and refuses to make a little compromise. They send police to violently suppress Hong Kong people, which completely angered Hong Kong people. Not only has the implementation of the Fugitive Offenders Ordinance failed, but Hong Kong's people have also lost their hearts and become enemies.
The suppression of the Hong Kong people allowed the people of Taiwan to see the hypocrisy of one country, two systems, and supported Taiwanese independence president Tsai Ing-wen to rise again. With the implementation of the Reverse Osmosis Act and the Taipei Act, Taiwan has no name for independence, but it has become independent, which completely bankrupted Taiwan's united front plan that had spent more than ten years of financial resources.
And when Xi Jinping revised the Constitution in 18 years, he really became Long Live Long Live Our Emperor.

text: ​ @한국인이페스트에걸리다  我再说一遍，中国今天的成就是人民奋斗的结果，而不是共产党。何为客观，我就想问中国有着世界上有数的重税，给人民发了多少福利？这次疫情给百姓发了多少钱? 看不起病，上不起学，买不起房的百姓有多少？现在连养老金都有耗尽的危险，真是为人民服务啊。中共执政的前40年，直到改革开放，中国先是大跃进，大饥荒然后文革，经济发展近乎停滞，非正常死亡人民无数，真的是很优秀的执政水平啊。我承认文革在破除中国封建思想方面的确起到了一定的积极作用，但文革总体上是一场浩劫。改革开放为何能够成功？因为中共放开了一部分的公民自由，人民可以自由经商，自由旅行，自由买卖，无不证明了只有自由开放的社会才能有进步。你可以去朝鲜问一问朝鲜人民支不支持金正恩，我还可以说100个人里100个人都支持呢。很可惜，我爱的是中国这片土地上的人民和文化，你爱的是世界上最大的独裁政体共产党。
author: busa haya
text_en: ​ @한국인이페스트에걸리다 I repeat, China's achievements today are the result of the struggle of the people, not the Communist Party. What is objectiveness? I just want to ask China has some of the world’s heavy taxes and how much benefits does it provide to the people? How much money did the epidemic give to the people? How many people can't afford to look down on illness, go to school, and can't afford to buy a house? Now even the pensions are in danger of running out. It really serves the people. During the first 40 years of the CCP’s ruling, until the reform and opening up, China first experienced the Great Leap Forward, the Great Famine and then the Cultural Revolution. Economic development was almost stagnant, and countless people died abnormally. This is really an excellent level of governance. I admit that the Cultural Revolution did play a positive role in breaking Chinese feudal thought, but the Cultural Revolution was a catastrophe on the whole. Why can reform and opening up succeed? Because the CCP has liberalized a part of civil liberties, the people can do business, travel freely, and buy and sell freely. It all proves that only a free and open society can make progress. You can go to North Korea and ask if the North Korean people support Kim Jong-un. I can also say that 100 out of 100 support him. It is a pity that I love the people and culture in this land of China, and what you love is the Communist Party, the world's largest dictatorship.

text:
我是Cisco原廠授權的網路工程師
這影片對於IP有初步的介紹，很棒。但是在最後某個地方還值得討論...
不只是對一般user，即使是有資訊背景的人，都不一定能夠完全理解IPv4甚至感到艱深難懂，
然而連網路工程師對IPv6的管理都容易感到頭痛，更何況是user？所以並不是user先支持v6，才去要求電信業也支持v6；
相對的，反而是產業界先實驗、部署IPv6，找尋有無革命性的產品或有利市場，才能夠繼續往user發展。
author: Chin
text_en:
I am a network engineer authorized by the original Cisco factory
This video has a preliminary introduction to IP, which is great. But somewhere in the end it's worth discussing...
Not only for ordinary users, even people with information background may not be able to fully understand IPv4 or even find it difficult to understand.
However, even network engineers are prone to headaches with IPv6 management, let alone users? Therefore, it is not that users support v6 first, and then ask the telecommunications industry to also support v6;
On the contrary, it is the industry that first experiment and deploy IPv6, looking for revolutionary products or favorable markets, before it can continue to develop towards users.

text: tn输出只能6bit262万色，ips输出6bit1677万色，显示效果差很多。而且本身发光方式，tn是垂直方向，可是角度小，ips是水平方向，可是角度大。不知道你的颜色更好是怎么得出来的。tn的刷新率高，ips的分辨率也高，刷新和分辨率选一，我还是选择分辨率。

The refresh rate of tn is high, and the resolution of ips is also high. Choose between refresh and resolution. I still choose resolution.

text:
水力发电出来的声音比较柔和,清亮, 人声处理比较自然,
而火力发电出来的声音在低音区比较比较好, 适合听重低音的摇滚乐,
而风力发电要看风扇叶的尺寸和地区, 目前新疆的风发出来的声音就比甘肃在高音区相对来说更加自然,
而核能发电则要看核裂变的半衰期...




操, 编不下去了!
author: Larry Zhang
text_en:
The sound produced by hydroelectric power generation is softer and clearer, and the human voice processing is more natural.
The sound produced by thermal power generation is better in the bass area, suitable for listening to rock music with heavy bass.
The wind power generation depends on the size and area of the fan blades. At present, the sound of wind in Xinjiang is relatively more natural than in Gansu in the high-pitched area.
And nuclear power generation depends on the half-life of nuclear fission...

text:
延伸參考

CPU vs GPU

中譯

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1CkmDQdNZxY

原影片

Mythbusters Demo GPU versus CPU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-P28LKWTzrI

----------

CPU要運算200個才會變成一張圖,是一個點一個點 點出一張圖片。
GPU是一瞬間就丟出兩百個點變成一張圖,一個是 一瞬間就把一張圖片需要的點 一次點滿出現圖片。
author: HADOW S
text_en:
Extended reference

CPU vs GPU

Chinese translation

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1CkmDQdNZxY

Original movie

Mythbusters Demo GPU versus CPU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-P28LKWTzrI

----------

The CPU needs to calculate 200 to become a picture, Is to click one point to point out a picture.
The GPU throws out two hundred points into a picture in an instant, and the other is to turn the points needed for a picture in an instant, and the picture will appear when the picture is full at a time..

text:
所以我的想法是這樣
CPU就是純計算機
但是沒有辦法顯示
然後GPU就是能把數字轉成光的三原色
好比2560*1440 =3686萬
再乘144幀就是53億
一秒能處理53億個點 的意思？
author: GoodEnough
text_en:
So my idea is like this
CPU is pure computer
But there is no way to display
Then the GPU is the three primary colors that can convert numbers into light
For example, 2560*1440 = 36.86 million
Multiplying by 144 frames is 5.3 billion
What does it mean to process 5.3 billion points in one second?

text: GPU是核心嗎？
author: super TV
text_en: Is the GPU the core?

text: @張育嘉  高並發性意思是說開多程式與大量的讀寫傳輸？
author: HADOW S
text_en: @张育嘉 High concurrency means to open multiple programs and a large number of read and write transmissions?

text: @張育嘉  如果是電競需求是選擇（cpu）繪圖需求是（ＧＰＵ）有點不清楚這2者使用需求的差別是能否解析可能？有沒有2者兼具的選擇可能？（就是同時有ＣＰＵ與ＧＰＵ的優勢選擇可能？）
author: HADOW S
text_en: @张育嘉 If the demand for e-sports is to choose (cpu), the drawing demand is (GPU). It is a bit unclear whether the difference between the two requirements is parseable? Is there a choice of both? (Is it possible to have the advantages of CPU and GPU at the same time?)

text: @HADOW S  併發是指同時運行的程式段有很多個，高併發就是併發程度很高
author: 張育嘉
text_en: @HADOW S Concurrency means that there are many program segments running at the same time. High concurrency means a high degree of concurrency

text: @張育嘉  能否多講解高並發性意思？
author: HADOW S
text_en: @张育嘉 Can you explain more about the meaning of high concurrency?

text:
@HADOW S  我之前看到過一個比喻，覺得是最合理的一個
他說CPU是一組大學生，他們可以解簡單到加減法難到複變函數的運算題目，還可以做邏輯判斷，但他們一次只能解幾個題目。
GPU是一群小學生，他們只能做加減乘除這種簡單的運算題目，還做不了邏輯判斷，但是他們一次可以解成百上千個題目。
還有更深一點的比喻是，小學生的解題速度是大學生的一半。
這個比喻合理在於不只對兩者的核心數量進行比較，也必較了核心本質的不同，CPU的核心可以完成更多複雜計算，同時可以完成GPU不能完成的邏輯運算，更深的比喻是在說明CPU和GPU的主頻不同，現在市面上的GPU主頻一般在10MHz，CPU的主頻在20-30MHz
author: 張育嘉
text_en:
@HADOW S I have seen a metaphor before and I think it is the most reasonable one
He said that CPU is a group of college students. They can solve arithmetic problems that are as simple as addition and subtraction to complex functions, and they can also make logical judgments, but they can only solve a few problems at a time.
GPU is a group of elementary school students. They can only do simple calculations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. They can't make logical judgments, but they can solve hundreds of problems at a time.
A deeper analogy is that the speed of solving problems for elementary school students is half that of college students.
This analogy is reasonable because it not only compares the number of cores between the two, but also compares the essence of the core. The core of the CPU can complete more complex calculations, and at the same time, it can complete logical operations that the GPU cannot. The deeper analogy is to illustrate the CPU. Unlike the main frequency of the GPU, the main frequency of the GPU on the market is generally 10MHz, and the main frequency of the CPU is 20-30MHz.

text: 張育嘉 如果你的觀點看cpu與gpu是？
author: HADOW S
text_en: Zhang Yujia If your point of view is cpu and gpu?

text:
樓主的這個比喻也很不錯
說的專業化一點，就是GPU注重高併發性，CPU一次對於一個資料點進行處裡，可以處理更複雜的計算，而GPU一次可以批量處理一堆資料點
author: 張育嘉
text_en:
This analogy of the original poster is also very good
The point of specialization is that the GPU pays attention to high concurrency. The CPU processes one data point at a time and can process more complex calculations, while the GPU can process a bunch of data points at a time.

author: 張育嘉

text: @納尼  "個"在這邊是指塑像點的個數
author: kgame
text_en: @纳尼 "个" here refers to the number of statue points

text: 200個是什麼 個字是什麼意思
author: 納尼
text_en: What does 200 mean?

text: @HADOW S  開多個程式，並不代表高併發，我們的電腦現在也可以多個程式運行，但最多16核的處理器也就16併發，並且這代表的是處理16個程式段，一個程式不會只有一個程式段，所以事實上大部分的程式是在等待的，但反過來說就對了，併發度較高可以一次性的處理較多的程式段，也就代表處理相同數量的多個程式時，時間可以花的比併發度低的還要少。讀寫的話，這個其實取決於處理器總線的情況，如果處理器總線的訪問時間越短，單位時間內讀寫次數就可以越高，當然了，假設無論如何不會達到總線使用上限，也就是每次讀寫請求可以立即執行不需要等待，當運行同樣的程式，那固定時間內，一定是併發度高的可以完成更多次讀寫次數了
author: 張育嘉
text_en: @HADOW S Opening multiple programs does not mean high concurrency. Our computer can also run multiple programs now, but a processor with a maximum of 16 cores also has 16 concurrency, and this means processing 16 program segments, one program There is not only one program segment, so in fact most programs are waiting, but the opposite is true. Higher concurrency can process more program segments at one time, which means processing the same number of more program segments. In a program, the time can be spent less than the low concurrency. For reading and writing, this actually depends on the processor bus. If the access time of the processor bus is shorter, the number of reads and writes per unit time can be higher. Of course, assuming that the upper limit of bus usage will not be reached anyway, that is Each read and write request can be executed immediately without waiting. When the same program is run, the one with high concurrency must be able to complete more reads and writes within a fixed period of time.

text: @HADOW S  我有點沒看懂你電競需求的那句話，至於有沒有可能兩者的優點兼具，顯然是可以的，只要GPU集成的單位，從簡單運算單元，變成CPU用的複雜邏輯運算單元即可，就差不多是超級電腦那個意思。但是這個不符合現在的電腦產業需求，對處理器生產公司來說，集成複雜邏輯運算單元的成本太高，不只是這樣一塊新的processing unit 生產成本高，能做到這樣一塊unit 的技術難度也高，而且良率不能很好的保證，是很不符合商業營運的，對組裝販售電腦的來說，選擇這樣一塊unit ，產品成本變高，售價不得不變高，高價位電腦會讓顧客望而卻步，同時，高效能unit 勢必需要很高效率的排熱系統，這會導致筆記型電腦不適合，桌上型主機也需要搭配更好的風扇，這會把價格提的更高，願意購買的人更少。對使用者來說，一般情況下複雜邏輯運算不需要這麼高的併發性，除非在做深度強化學習，或是高強度的並行計算，但這些工作寫程式的人也懂得使用雲端計算資源，去租幾個計算力用就可以了，對其他情況，CPU 或GPU 足矣，所以知道的人，也會因此在選擇電腦的時候，選擇CPU 搭載GPU的，而不是這種新的unit
author: 張育嘉
text_en: @HADOW S I didn’t understand the sentence about your gaming needs. As for whether it is possible to have the advantages of both, obviously it is possible. As long as the GPU integrated unit changes from a simple arithmetic unit to a complex logic for the CPU The arithmetic unit is enough, which is almost the meaning of a supercomputer. However, this does not meet the needs of the current computer industry. For processor production companies, the cost of integrating complex logic operation units is too high. Not only is the production cost of such a new processing unit high, but it is also technically difficult to achieve such a unit. High, and the yield rate cannot be guaranteed. It is very inconsistent with commercial operations. For those who assemble and sell computers, choosing such a unit will increase the cost of the product, and the price will have to increase. High-priced computers will make Customers are discouraged. At the same time, high-efficiency units will inevitably require a highly efficient heat extraction system, which will make laptops unsuitable, and desktop hosts also need to be equipped with better fans, which will raise the price higher and more people who are willing to buy. less. For users, in general, complex logic operations do not require such high concurrency, unless they are doing deep reinforcement learning or high-intensity parallel computing, but those who write programs for these tasks also know how to use cloud computing resources. Just rent a few computing power and use it. For other situations, CPU or GPU is enough, so people who know will also choose CPU equipped with GPU instead of this new unit when choosing a computer.

text: 可以進行CPU 運算的GPU
author: 魏秀慧
text_en: GPU that can perform CPU operations

text:
GPU設計成以量取勝的目的是同步輸出
假設用CPU算的話，會佔用大量的運算單元
這樣就犧牲了CPU運算遊戲資料的價值

text: 域名解析配置不同而已。比如你配置www.xxx.com指向18.18.18.18 ，配置xxx.com也指向18.18.18.18 ，那么你通过www.xxx.com和xxx.com 就都可以访问18.18.18.18 这个服务器了，DNS域名解析，了解一下。😁
author: 遇见数据
text_en: The domain name resolution configuration is different. For example, if you configure www.xxx.com to point to 18.18.18.18, and configure xxx.com to point to 18.18.18.18, then you can access the 18.18.18.18 server through both www.xxx.com and xxx.com, DNS domain name resolution, Learn about. 😁

text: 補充：因為時代在發展，近年許多網站的域名都沒有 www，然而一些較老的網站還帶有 www，大部分網站會修正訪問者輸錯的網址。因為之前我有提到瀏覽器會幫使用者加上 http://，所以如果在地址條輸入 apple.com，瀏覽器會先把地址修正成 http://apple.com，然後電腦會使用 DNS 查到 apple.com 所對應的 IP 地址，接著瀏覽器會以 http 協議訪問這個 IP 地址所對應的電腦（這台電腦就是蘋果公司的伺服器），伺服器接到這個訪問請求後，發現其實正確的域名是有帶 www 的，所以伺服器就給你的電腦發了一封回信告訴你的瀏覽器應該訪問 https://www.apple.com/ 這個正確的地址。當你的瀏覽器得知這個消息後，會自動用這個新的地址重新訪問，而使用者可以看到地址中的協議和域名發生了變化。
author: い ろい
text_en: Supplement: Because of the development of the times, many websites do not have www in their domain names in recent years. However, some older websites still have www. Most websites will correct the wrong URLs entered by visitors. Because I mentioned before that the browser will add http:// to the user, so if you enter apple.com in the address bar, the browser will first correct the address to http://apple.com, and then the computer will use DNS Find the IP address corresponding to apple.com, and then the browser will access the computer corresponding to this IP address (this computer is Apple’s server) using the http protocol. After receiving the access request, the server finds that it is actually correct The domain name has www, so the server sends a reply to your computer telling your browser that it should visit https://www.apple.com/ this correct address. When your browser learns this message, it will automatically revisit with this new address, and the user can see that the protocol and domain name in the address have changed.

text: 小芬 http / https 是協議（protocol），www 是域名（domain name）的一部分。我們訪問一個網站的時候，你的瀏覽器會找到域名所對應的 IP 地址。這樣你的電腦和這個 IP 地址的電腦（伺服器，一種特殊的電腦）就可以根據協議來進行通訊。協議規定了通訊方法，讓雙方的軟體能夠按照這個方法規則來通信，譬如傳輸一個圖檔等等。一般情況下，如果不輸入 http 或 https，瀏覽器會默認幫你加上 http 來開始訪問網站。如果「網址」輸錯，伺服器會根據自己的情況，告訴你的瀏覽器如何修正，具體細節就不說了。
author: い ろい
text_en: Xiaofen http / https is the protocol and www is part of the domain name. When we visit a website, your browser will find the IP address corresponding to the domain name. In this way, your computer and the computer (server, a special computer) with this IP address can communicate according to the protocol. The agreement stipulates the communication method, so that the software of both parties can communicate according to the rules of this method, such as transmitting a picture file and so on. Under normal circumstances, if you do not enter http or https, the browser will add http for you by default to start visiting the website. If the "URL" is entered incorrectly, the server will tell your browser how to correct it based on its own situation, and the specific details will not be mentioned.

text: 胡说，就是VPN代理，只不过不同的加速器厂商使用了更好的更快线路的vps，甚至定制化的传输控制协议，（拿tcp和 udp举例，tcp需要三次握手， udp只需要一次握手所以理论上使用udp协议可以降低一半的延时。）还专门开一条线路，合着网易UU还给你拉了一条光纤？
author: isanybodythere
text_en: Nonsense, it’s a VPN proxy, but different accelerator manufacturers use better and faster line vps, and even customized transmission control protocols. (Take tcp and udp for example, tcp needs three handshake, udp only needs one handshake, so theoretically Using the udp protocol on the Internet can reduce the delay by half.) Also opened a special line, and co-authored with NetEase UU and pulled you a fiber?
